name: Twerk Addict: Miley Edition
description:
Get in on the latest dance craze & instantly Twerk like a pro!
*No lessons required*

Twerk through 9 challenging levels, each unlocking a unique video background!
Do you have what it takes to unlock the famous 'wrecking ball' ?

Features include:

Crop your face in,
Choose your own music,
Unlock different levels & backgrounds,
Save your Twerk to your phone,
Share with friends & surprise them with your newly found dance moves for hours of fun and laughter!


Guaranteed to be twerking in under a minute!

Be apart of the latest dance craze before its to late!
